Chaos: Ch5
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Epics In Progress, Section III: Chaos: Ch5
By Waddafxup 101 on Monday, July 16, 2007 - 06:58 pm:

Everyone was very gloomy about Noble not getting to go to the Big Four.

"He deserved it the most." Wolfeye said with a bitter touch.

"Well,we need move on.I'll make it up to him." Chris comforted all of them.

"Yeah..." Judo said , but he was not listening.

All he could think about was Noble and how sad he probably is right now.Of course Noble would never act or say it.Noble wasn't like that.Noble would always be serious and firm.Noble was someone to look up too.

He never panicked, not even in the most stressful situations.He always thought positive.
He could cheer anyone up while still being serious and emotionless.

If you could sum him up in one word, it would be wise.He was the definition of wise.He has seen more than anyone has ever seen. Always giving advice to the young.He-

Thud!

"What was that?!"BoneFist asked.

"It sounded like something hit us."Chris replied

"I'll check it out"judo offered.

"Ok,Go ask the captain."

So Judo went outside to see a lovely sunset. Nothing could go wrong tonight.Absolutely nothing.

When Judo finally entered the captain's quarters,he doesn't find the captian.He comes to find a decayed body with small monsters or.. things devouring his body...
